WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
SIX PERSONS OVERBOARD FROM VESSEL IN VICINITY
38-40.00N 007-25.00E AT 190850Z NOV. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT, CGCP3REP4@MIT.GOV.IT.
